scripts.ci: yarn prettier && yarn lint && yarn dbuild && yarn test
scripts.dbuild: yarn workspace @dolthub/web-utils dbuild && yarn workspace @dolthub/react-hooks dbuild && yarn workspace @dolthub/proto-resource-utils dbuild
scripts.lint: yarn workspace @dolthub/react-hooks lint && yarn workspace @dolthub/web-utils lint && yarn workspace @dolthub/proto-resource-utils lint
scripts.prettier: yarn workspace @dolthub/react-hooks prettier && yarn workspace @dolthub/web-utils prettier && yarn workspace @dolthub/proto-resource-utils prettier
scripts.test: yarn workspace @dolthub/react-hooks test && yarn workspace @dolthub/web-utils test && yarn workspace @dolthub/proto-resource-utils test
